mapper.select: SELECT years, samsungt, samsunga, kiat, kiaa, lottet, lottea, lgt, lga, doosant, doosana, hanwhat, hanwhaa, skt, ska, kiwoomt, kiwooma, nct, nca, ktt, kta, totalt, totala FROM ahFive ORDER BY years DESC

SELECT sum(samsungt) totalsamsungt, round(AVG(samsunga)) avgsamsunga, sum(kiat) totalkiat, round(AVG(kiaa)) avgkiaa, sum(lottet) totallottet, round(AVG(lottea)) avglottea, sum(lgt) totallgt, round(AVG(lga)) avglga, sum(doosant) totaldoosant, round(AVG(doosana)) avgdoosana, sum(hanwhat) totalhanwhat, round(AVG(hanwhaa)) avghanwhaa, sum(skt) totalskt, round(AVG(ska)) avgska, sum(kiwoomt) totalkiwoomt, round(AVG(kiwooma)) avgkiwooma, sum(nct) totalnct, round(AVG(nca)) avgnca, sum(ktt) totalktt, round(AVG(kta)) avgkta, sum(totalt) totaltotalt, round(AVG(totala)) avgtotala FROM ahFive
